tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE market_data (
  date DATE,
  stock_symbol VARCHAR,
  closing_price DECIMAL,
  volume INT
)

CREATE TABLE market_data ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    symbol VARCHAR(255), 
    price NUMERIC, 
    volume INT, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE risk_exposure ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    symbol VARCHAR(255), 
    exposure_level NUMERIC, 
    risk_factor INT, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE trends_in_market_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    market_sector VARCHAR(255),
    trend_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE risk_exposure (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    sector_id INT,
    risk_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE market_sectors (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sector_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE sector_performance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    sector_id INT,
    performance_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE TradeHistory (
  trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  symbol VARCHAR(50),
  trade_volume INT,
  trade_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE MarketTrends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  symbol VARCHAR(50),
  trend_type VARCHAR(50),
  trend_description TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
